extendedInfo.description: Music WiiMote makes your Wii remote into a media controller. Forget about unlocking your phone just to pause or change the track, with Music WiiMote all it takes is a press of a button.Music WiiMote allows you to:PlayPauseSkip Next TrackPrevious TrackLower VolumeIncrease VolumeMuteDuck (lowers volume by 50% while button in pressed)Preset 2 Pandora stations or favorite music appIf you're like me and like to plug your phone into your carsâ aux jack and listen to your music collection or favorite Pandora station. You know the hassle it is to skip a track once your screen has turned off, especially if you have password/pattern lock. With Music WiiMote, once your Wii remote is paired, you can forget about the hassle and danger of changing the track while driving. All it takes is a button press to change track.Music WiiMote uses Wiimote Controller by C.C.P. Cre@ions to pair with your wii remote. Music WiiMote will prompt you to install Wiimote Controller if it is not found.This app doesn't work on phones with HTC Sense UI and most newer Samsung phones (Galaxy S included)

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: This is a very cool app that works awesome! I use it with poweramp and works easily!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Amazing application!
reviews.comment: Works great on HTC one X. Pairs very easily with my wiimote and works well. One bug is when you go to assign an app to buttons 1 or 2 it force closes and does not assign the app to the button. Also should auto turn off bluetooth on music deactivation in the app. Otherwise incredible!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect!
reviews.comment: A must-have app if you own a Wii. Now I can keep my device and portable speakers safely off to the side and still control the music. Thank you for making it a free app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: amazing
reviews.comment: I use this app to pause/play/next/previous in my car while the phone is docked.  I have been looking for some way to remotely control the media in my phone for a long time and now I finally can.  It\'s a little goofy to keep a wiimote in my car but it gets the job done and is much safer than reaching over to change songs while driving!  I love this app!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs remapping capabilities
reviews.comment: Having the bluetooth drain battery isn\'t really a problem, it\'s the lack of remapping capabilities (or at least a disable feature). The ducking option is very cool conceptually, but it\'s basically always on when the controller is in your pocket.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome app
reviews.comment: This won\'t work on HTC sense. Works well with my Xoom. Perfect for my car to change the songs since I hook it up to my stereo
reviews.author: Gio H

reviews.title: Very Useful!
reviews.comment: I use my android tablet as a central music player in my house and it is really useful to be able to have remotes in different places to control the player. The only downside is that i have two music players, archoses preinstalled one and player pro, and the app only works with player pro, i dont know if it would work with archoses player if player pro wasnt installed but i havent tried uninstalling it because its not really a problem. I dont see how people can say that its too bulky to have a wii remote because if you have a phone, why do you need a controller and if you have a tablet then its tiny compared to that. One improvement would be to be able to rotate the next and previous tracks because you have to use the remote sideways to make it make sense.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome App
reviews.comment: This app is babies. It has double rainbows, and flying unicorns. :-)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Downloaded just to comment.  Useless app.
reviews.comment: You want to pull out a big blocky controller just to change tracks?  Not to mention Bluetooth battery drainage. Pffffft.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pooh
reviews.comment: It won\'t work on my HTC evo!!! Fix please cause I have no problem deleting it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Awesome on zte groove from cricket. Model: x501
reviews.author: Francisco Javier Duron
